text: (ai rasool) kya tum ne us shakhs (ke haal) par nazar nahin kee jo sirf is birate par ki khuda ne use saltanat dee thee ibraaheem se unake paravaradigaar ke baare mein ulajh pada ki jab ibraaheem ne (usase) kaha ki mera paravaradigaar to vah hai jo (logon ko) jilaata aur maarata hai to vo bhee (shekhee mein) aakar kahane laga main bhee jilaata aur maarata hoon (tumhaare khuda hee mein kaun sa kamaal hai) ibraaheem ne kaha (achchha) khuda to aafataab ko poorab se nikaalata hai bhala tum usako pashchim se nikaalo is par vah kaafir hakka bakka ho kar rah gaya (magar eemaan na laaya) aur khuda zaalimon ko manzile maqasood tak nahin pahunchaaya karata
